forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain developing after midnight. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming cloudy with occasional rain late. Low 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered thunderstorms in the morning followed by occasional showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered thunderstorms in the morning followed by occasional showers in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High 12C. SSE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 53F. SSE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low near 45F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 12C. NE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 53F. NE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 8C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 46F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 43F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 53F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 4C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 39F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 12C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 54F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low near 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 53F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 12C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 54F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
